plot: Upas is a happily married Indian woman, one problem - her mother in law. She decides to get rid of her so she can have some peace with her husband. It all goes wrong when she gets hijacked by other criminals.
title: Stuck in Traffic in Durban
plot_es: Upas is a happily married Indian woman, one problem - her mother in law. She decides to get rid of her so she can have some peace with her husband. It all goes wrong when she gets hijacked by other criminals.
plot_en: Upas is a happily married Indian woman, one problem - her mother in law. She decides to get rid of her so she can have some peace with her husband. It all goes wrong when she gets hijacked by other criminals.
